title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Aug 18 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Aug 18 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Absurd Biden State Department puts out very strongly worded letter telling the Taliban to be inclusive and respect human rights. Dems feeling Grandpa Joe remorse? Trump vaporized Soleimani, Biden sends letters. Americans trapped in Afghanistan, Psaki refuses to guarantee safety. Intel community turns on Biden, leaks to NYT, WSJ. Rasmussen poll shows Dems, independents deserting Biden, Trump winning head-to-head matchup in a landslide. New data from Hawaii shows masks don't work, over-the-top liberal criticism of DeSantis will backfire again.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
